entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low.
